channel.title: Global Variables :: CIS 301 Textbook
channel.description: Motivation We will now consider programs with multiple functions that modify a shared pool of global variables. (This is very similar to the concerns in general classes in Java or C#, where multiple methods might edit fields/property values for an object). We want to be sure that global variables will maintain desired ranges and relationships between one another, even as multiple functions modify their values. Global variables in Logika A global variable exists before any function call, and still exists after any function ends.
